Battleship Yamato","shortPlot":"Adaptaci\u00f3n del anime hom\u00f3nimo creado en los a\u00f1os 70 por el maestro Leiji Ma...","plot":"Adaptaci\u00f3n del anime hom\u00f3nimo creado en los a\u00f1os 70 por el maestro Leiji Matsumoto (\"Capit\u00e1n Harlock\"), \"Space Battleship Yamato\" nos sit\u00faa en el a\u00f1o 2199, cinco a\u00f1os despu\u00e9s que apareciesen unos misteriosos alien\u00edgenas llamados Gamilas y empezasen a atacar a la Tierra con meteoritos gigantes y dejar su superficie totalmente inhabitable por culpa de la radiaci\u00f3n post-b\u00e9lica. A la raza humana apenas le queda un a\u00f1o de vida cuando se recibe un enigm\u00e1tico mensaje proveniente del lejano planeta Iscandar, asegurando que poseen un artilugio capaz de eliminar la radiaci\u00f3n de la Tierra y ofreciendo su ayuda a los humanos. Decididos a salvar el planeta, las Fuerzas de Defensa reconstruyen el acorazado espacial Yamato para poder realizar el incre\u00edble viaje que les llevar\u00e1 a m\u00e1s de 150.000 a\u00f1os luz de distancia en busca de un desconocido planeta que puede ser la \u00faltima esperanza para la raza humana y para la Tierra.","cast":[{"name":"Takuya Kimura","role":"Susumu Kodai","images":null,"id":36880},{"name":"Meisa Kuroki","role":"Yuki Mori","images":null,"id":78241},{"name":"Toshir\u00f4 Yanagiba","role":"Shiro Sanada","images":null},{"name":"Naoto Ogata","role":"Daisuke Shima","images":null},{"name":"Hiroyuki Ikeuchi","role":"Hajime Saito","images":null,"id":229504},{"name":"Shin'ichi Tsutsumi","role":"Mamoru Kodai","images":{"face":"\/39\/f7\/39f7a985842f42f67d6cbbb38f97d8af.jpg"},"id":34298},{"name":"Maiko","role":"Aihara","images":null},{"name":"Reiko Takashima","role":"Doctor Sado","images":null,"id":227054},{"name":"Toshiyuki Nishida","role":"Hikozaemon Tokugawa","images":null,"id":96889},{"name":"Toshihiro Yashiba","role":"Yasuo Nanbu","images":null}],"genres":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"distributor":null,"numInteractions":8230,"numRatings":1484,"ratingHistogram":{"1":62,"2":108,"3":420,"4":575,"5":319},"seasonsBlocked":[],"producers":[{"name":"Kazuya Hamana","role":"executive producer  ","images":null},{"name":"Toshiaki Nakazawa","role":"executive producer  ","images":null},{"name":"Toshiaki Nakazawa","role":"producer  ","images":null}],"writers":[{"name":"Leiji Matsumoto","role":"(manga)","images":null},{"name":"Shimako Sato","role":"(screenplay)","images":null},{"name":"Yoshinobu Nishizaki","role":" story","images":null}],"countries":["JP"],"directors":[{"name":"Takashi Yamazaki","role":null,"images":null,"id":9333}],"composer":null,"availability":{"inTheaters":false,"vodSummary":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"vod":[],"schedule":[],"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"status":1,"statusMedia":"watched"}
